name: Driving SIM
description:
Description 

Driving SIM is a 3D game which simulated the real driving procedures. It is a first person game where the player will drive a car on the road. Players can change lanes. But  they need to do some actions before they change lanes to get marks.

So playing this game can maintain the players have a good driving habit. Ensure them a better and safe driving in the real world. 

Driving SIM is very easy and convenient to play, the players do not need too much time to play this game. One round of game is no more than 5 minutes. So players can spend their short spare time playing this game.

This game only has 2 scenes, the menu scene and the main scene to play the game. Also at the end of the main scene, there is a final result that will show up to tell the players how they drive this time.

Controls 

Menu scene 

  • “Space” --- press “Space” to load the main scene to start playing the game.

Main scene

  • “Q”--- to check the left mirror
  • “W”---to check the top mirror
  • “E”---to check the right mirror
  • “A”---to turn the head to left to check the left blind spot
  • “D”---to turn the head to right to check the right blind spot
  • “Space”---while “A” or “D” are holding, press “space” to change the lane
  • “Up Arrow”--- to speed up
  • “Down Arrow”---to use brake to slow down
  • “Left Arrow”---turn on the left indicator
  • “Right Arrow”---turn on the right indicator
  • “Backspace”---after the game finish, press “backspace” to go back to the menu scene
Game Process
  • step 1
    • change lanes
    • turning head check blid spot
    • check side mirror
    • check top mirror
    • turn on indicator
  • step 2
    • changing lanes to take over othe cars
  • step3
    • try to finish 10 time of changing lanes within limited distance to get higher score
